meta.title: Avatar
meta.description: Avatars are typically used to display a user profile as a picture, an icon, or short text.

props.description: Applies one of the Bootstrap theme color variants to the component
Text to place in the avatar
Image URL to use for the avatar
Icon name to use for the avatar. Must be all lowercase. Defaults to `person-fill` if `text` or `src` props not provided
Value to place in the 'alt' attribute for image and icon avatars
Size of the avatar. Refer to the documentation for details
When set to `true`, renders the avatar as a button
Type of button to render (i.e. `button`, `submit`, `reset`). Has no effect if prop button is not set
Disables rounding of the avatar, rending the avatar with square corners
Specifies the type of rounding to apply to the avatar. The `square` prop takes precedence. Refer to the documentation for details

slots.name: default
slots.description: Content to place in the avatar. Overrides props `text`, `src`, and `icon-name`

events.description: Emitted when the avatar is clicked (when rendered as a button or link)
